+public class DataOptions {
+

+  public static final String DATA_STORAGE_MODE_OPTION_NAME = "--data-storage-mode";
+
+  public static final String DEFAULT_DATA_PATH = ".";

+      names = {DATA_PATH_OPTION_NAME},
